website_summaries.verdict: For the money, this well-built lighted magnifier is loaded with features, including 3X, 4.5X and close-up 25X magnification.
pros: There are three ultra-bright LED lights for use at night
Good for indoor or outdoor use
cons: Some owners report that the higher-powered lenses are too small to be practical

customer_reviews.title: New Version MagniPros Ultra Bright Magnifying Glass is perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I love this new MagniPros Ultra bright LED Handheld Magnifying glass. It is just the right weight when you hold it. It is lighter than others that I have owned before. It is very comfortable as the handle is made to fit your hand perfectly. Yes, it is an Ultra bright light, but not too bright to put a glare on the paper,,..just right! It has an off and on button that is very easy to work. I picked this size because it is not too large and yet you can see so much. New version is excellent. You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Carole D.

customer_reviews.title: Happy user!
customer_reviews.text: PLEASE NOTE: I RESPONDED TO YOUR EARLIER MESSAGE WITH THE FOLLOWING NOTE, WHICH ARE EFFECTIVELY A REVIEW. I ordered and received the MagniPros 3 Ultra Bright LED magnifier. My wife has vision problems and she is absolutely overjoyed with your product. The addition of the LEDs makes it so much easier to look at fine print she is trying to read. Prior to receiving this product, she would have to shine a portable light through a hand-held magnifier and try to hold both steady to read fine print. She is delighted with your product and so am I. You have satisfied the rule "If Mama's happy, everybody's happy!" Thank you so much for this very helpful tool! Ken Lundeen
customer_reviews.author: Ken Leroy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tool
customer_reviews.text: I recently found this my most valuable tool in checking serial codes on a thousand-plus assorted computer parts. The big lens served for most items. The highest magnification lens at the base of the handle was sometimes indispensible in helping me confidently distinguish a smudged "5" from a "6" in 6-point font or other close calls. The AAA batteries have not noticeably dimmed after several weeks and 100 uses per hour. When they do go, they'll be easy to replace. I'm getting one for home. When a couple of times I dropped the magnifier a half meter, the batteries door and batteries popped out. Easily fixed with a rubber band.
customer_reviews.author: GJ

customer_reviews.title: MagniPros Ultra Bright LED Magnifying Glass
customer_reviews.text: It's lightweight and the LEDs worked. I was very disappointed in quality of the main lens. There were distortions and image lacked clarity. The redeeming point is that it was inexpensive. I would not repeat this buy.
customer_reviews.author: Michael K. Lamb

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: Large glass portion (3X) had a 25 cent-sized flaw dead center and a 10 cent-sized flaw at the 10 o'clock position. Hold up to a white paper and the whole glass is filled with miniscule flaws. Bought a simple 3X magnifying glass at Ace Hardware for $5; totally clear and works great. The 4.5X and 10X windows are OK.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah B Mathews

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: Defective. I put brand new batteries in it. They don't come with the unit. But, of the three LEDs, the left one didn't work, and the right flickered. I tried different batteries. No difference. Packed it up and sent it back. I like the size of it. It's not too big, but big enough. I don't know if I will try another. I hate getting defective products.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Pilecki

customer_reviews.title: Such a nice magnifying glass!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this magnifying glass! It is very comfortable in the hand. It is lightweight, even with the batteries in place. (Thank you for that!) The size of the overall glass is really nice, large enough to avoid re-positioning over and over and so nice to have the 2 areas of ultra and maximum magnification for use when needed! This is just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy L. Axsom

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this 5 months ago, have been using it frequently ever since. Strong light, excellent magnification, with three useful levels (mostly I just use the standard magnification, but for things like tying flies onto my flycasting fishing pole, the high mag options are very helpful). Original batteries I installed are still running strong. Just ordered a second one to have upstairs by my computer, mostly for reading fine print instructions related to computer stuff. I highly recommend this product, especially for older folks like me who need a little help. :) And I can't complain about the price either, which seems very reasonable to me. ($10).
customer_reviews.author: Ike47

customer_reviews.title: The 25X lense does not have a designated light
customer_reviews.text: This review is for the MagniPros 3 Ultra Bright LED Lights 3X 4.5X 25X Power Handheld Reading Magnifying Glass with Light. Overall this appears to be a good magnifier. The three lights are sufficient for the larger magnifying glass but not for the 25X magnifier; it needs to be used in a well lit area. Fortunately, we can use this one at home. The second magnifiying glass we purchased is perfect for the shop because the 25X has its own little designated light that eliminates the need for additional lighting.
customer_reviews.author: Jude

customer_reviews.title: Very useful for doing puzzles
customer_reviews.text: The Magnipros magnifying glass is great for doing puzzles. It's comfortable in the hand and magnifies without significant distortion. The LED lights are even more useful than I was expecting. I live in a condo that does not have very good lighting and was surprised by how much easier it is to do a puzzle using the LED lights. I have been using the magnifying glass for only a few days so I can't report on how long it lasts but it seems be sturdy and well made. I'm pleased with my Magnipros and have already recommended it to several of my friends who are doing puzzles.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's Like Magic
customer_reviews.text: I'm 67 and have worn glasses since I was 13. With the cataracts I now have it's often difficult to read very small print. The MagniPro 3 Ultra Bright LED Light magnifying glass is exactly what I needed to assist with this issue. With the touch of a button, while holding the glass over the paper that I'm reading it's like magic and I can see every small detail. Thank you MagniPro for helping me see all the necessary details!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: Junk, there is simply no other word. The lens was marked, the magnifying power is poor to bleh. If you want or need a magnifying glass, then get a good one; which is exactly what I told my grandson before he ordered this, on my account of course. I wasn't real bright as a teenager either.
customer_reviews.author: Rabbit the Reader

customer_reviews.title: Not very bright
customer_reviews.text: the most important thing for me was the light. I'm using it to see inside honeycomb to see bee eggs, they're very small and at the bottom of the comb. The light does not provide strong or concentrated light to help with this task. the glass itself is fine, just my usage is not working so well. 3x magnification also won't work for many small tasks
customer_reviews.author: Springfield VA Dad

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Magnifying Glass
customer_reviews.text: This is the best magnifying glass! The lens is clear and there's no distortion. The LED lights make it so easy to use without having to find a good light to look under. It's the perfect glass for really small print even when you have good prescription glasses. My husband and I love it so much that I just ordered 2 more of them to have around the house. I highly recommend this product - you won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Linda B

customer_reviews.title: you can carry it in your purse
customer_reviews.text: This magnifier works very well. I just need it to decipher some labels, so 3x and 4.5x are plenty good for me. It is very easy to use. You don't need an instruction manual. I emphasize the easy to use aspect because my mom has a big and unwieldy magnifier. If something takes an effort to use it, you tend to avoid using it. Therefore, your money is wasted. With this magnifier, you will not have that regret.
customer_reviews.author: siddhartha

customer_reviews.title: Mandatory Aid for all the Small Print We Encounter in Daily Life
customer_reviews.text: It's not just getting older that hinders readability but Lawyers adding disclaimers to cover their buns with everything sold that we constantly cannot read what's given to us. Truly a handy inexpensive tool. So useful for so little money.
customer_reviews.author: Allen H. West

customer_reviews.title: We went to the same pond and these glasses were perfect for this
customer_reviews.text: I bought three of them for my three grandsons. We had a day at the Local Nature Center and they had a table with a lady that brought a bucket of water from the nearby pond. In it was several different little pond critters. She had a magnifying glass for the kids to look at the very small bugs and larva. My boys could not stop looking at everything. So I got these for them. We went to the same pond and these glasses were perfect for this. I love the three different magnifications and the LED light is perfect. We will have many more hours of exploring to do with them. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: DeAnne Freter

customer_reviews.title: Best little thing ever!  I bought TWO!
customer_reviews.text: This lightweight lighted Magnifying glass Works like a charm. It's perfect while I'm sitting at My sewing machine trying to do any number of things.Of course, it's wonderful for reading. The best thing about it is the different varying degrees of magnification. It works so well I bought one as a gift and she loved it as well. I have to admit, when I opened it, I thought it was cheap. Using it is a completely different story. It's much brighter and lighter than the one I was using, which I haven't used since.
customer_reviews.author: AddictedToAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Light, bright and just right!
customer_reviews.text: This has the right magnification levels to handle all of your needs. Need to read some smaller print, use the main magnifier. Need to see that splinter in your finger, use the higher magnification circle within the main magnifier. Need real close up, use the magnifier in the handle. Light weight, yet durable. Nice bright light too. You can't go wrong with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Mike M.

customer_reviews.title: It's Great!
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with the magnifying lens. The LED lights are bright enough to help me see very small things - like beading needles I drop in my carpet, lol. I have a slight vision problem and sometimes have problems reading very small charts and now it is much easier for me to do so. I would be more than happy to recommend this product to others that have the need to use a hand held magnifier. Barbara
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Making the impossible, possible!
customer_reviews.text: The MagniPros 3 Ultra Bright LED Lights is wonderful for Seniors (like myself) with diminished 20/20 vision. It makes the impossible , possible, such as reading tiny print on the back of bottles of vitamin supplements. It makes it possible to read books in small print. I highly recommend this product for anyone with impaired vision that has trouble reading any type of printed material. Note that you will need to add 3 triple A batteries to the handle for the light to work.
customer_reviews.author: Riiss

customer_reviews.title: BEST MAGNIFYING GLASS EVER!~
customer_reviews.text: Oh, wow, oh wow, just WOW! I'm getting older and have a hard time seeing labels on lipsticks, etc. the writing is SOOOO tiny on those things. I was able to see that TEENY writing so clearly! omgh, BEST thing I've bought in a long time. I am in the process of buying one of these right now here on Amazon for my 86 year old client! Price is on target, just as described! Perfect gift for family members!
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl L. Ketchum

customer_reviews.title: Great for Puzzles
customer_reviews.text: A friend who owns this product and uses it to better see jigsaw puzzle pieces recommended it to me. Being older and needing more light and magnification to adequately see puzzle pieces I have also found it to be essential. My only disappointment is that the light can focus on only one piece at a time. If there were a broader width of the beam I could better scan multiple pieces scattered around the board. Even with this imperfection, I would highly recommend this product for people who need some aid in seeing a variety of tasks adequately.
customer_reviews.author: A. Public Name

customer_reviews.title: the best
customer_reviews.text: I am amazed at how bright this lamp can get! The CS person at amazon researched this for me as in my bathroom there is not enough light on my vanity. Now I can easily see to put on my make up! Thank you. I will be purchasing another for my desk! Love this.. simple little things make life easier!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne' Kirkpatrick

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for all the miniscule print encountered every day.
customer_reviews.text: It does what it's supposed to do, a quality lacking so often. Glad I checked out a number of magnifiers before chosing this one. I use it mainly to read fine print on medicine inserts, identifying codes on prescription pills, articles in my newspaper feeds on my phone, etc. Basically all the "just because they can doesn't mean they should" print out there today.
customer_reviews.author: Roxy Ekstrom

customer_reviews.title: LED MAGNIFIER
customer_reviews.text: Size of batteries not specified. Extremely difficult to install batteries in the 3 battery arrangement. Had 2 AAA batteries to try and insert! Batteries kept popping up from springs! Awaiting new batteries. If trouble again will return item! Lousy design of unit!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad I bought this magnifying glass. Even with contacts and glasses, I cannot read very small print. I had to go by the sunlight and use a magnifying glass and it was very frustrating. This magnifier works fine and I love the lights. It seems I need more light to read. I keep it on my table so it is available whenever I need it.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty

customer_reviews.title: POOR QUALITY AND DIM LIGHT
customer_reviews.text: THE LENS IS DEFECTIVE IN THAT IT DISTORTS THE OBJECT, IN PARTICULAR PRINTING. THE LIGHT IS DIM BECAUSE IT IS ONLY TWO LEDS LOCATED IN THE HANDLE RATHER THAN ON THE RIM.
customer_reviews.author: Able Devildog

customer_reviews.title: It's OK and things do appear bigger
customer_reviews.text: Unlike my other glass, this came without a storage case of any type. The batteries are awkwardly kept in the handle, which has a tendency to pop open. It does magnify and the LEDs work well. If this is stolen, I will purchase a different model.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected & easy to hold
customer_reviews.text: Very nice magnifier. I love the led light option which I used as a flashlight during a recent power outage. It’s easy to use while reading in low light because it’s so lightweight. Perfect for me. Just add two AAA batteries & you are good to go.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia G.

customer_reviews.title: It lets me read tiny tiny letters
customer_reviews.text: I love this magnifying glass because it lets me read the tiny letters that are on items I buy at garage sales. A regular magnifying glass is not powerful enough for that. I am 100% satisfied with this product. I take it with me to every garage sale.
customer_reviews.author: Chef Nunya

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Husband has macular degeneration and the printing on some CD's are so small that he can't read well. This makes it possible to read.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Ann

customer_reviews.title: Way weaker than I had expected.
customer_reviews.text: Not very good magnifying strength. I have a much smaller magnifying glass that actually does a better job than this one.
customer_reviews.author: R. Goodrich

customer_reviews.title: It has three different magnifying powers available for your use.
customer_reviews.text: I had a previous magnifying glass with an LED light but it would operate intermittently and the battery cover kept coming loose. This one works great with none of those problems and I really like the feature of multiple magnifying powers.
customer_reviews.author: Mike B.

customer_reviews.title: My friend loves it
customer_reviews.text: I bought the magnifying glass- pro 3 Magni ultra bright led light 3x 4.5x 25x with light, for a 90 year old friend of mine. She now can read small prints where she couldn’t before (Newspapers and magazine)and she told me the light come in handy. she loves it! It’s light weight and easy to hold she told me.
customer_reviews.author: Igotmail

customer_reviews.title: Everything and more
customer_reviews.text: I didn't even realize what a great glass I was ordering. It is everything I needed and more, with 3 different magnifications. Thank you thank you thank you, and the light is very useful as well.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Moffett

customer_reviews.title: If you are looking for a hand held magnifier, THIS IS IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great quality product. Sturdy, well built, small yet perfect size to not be too small. I use this product for my Diamond Art projects (very small beads and sometimes difficult symbols to read) and I could not be happier. If you are looking for a hand held magnifier, this is it!
customer_reviews.author: Karleen Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Fully Illuminate
customer_reviews.text: This magnifying glass is barely acceptable. The fit and finish is excellent as are the optics. So why a bad rating? The LED lights are arranged to illuminate the 3-1/2" diameter lens. However, when using the highest magnification lens located in the handle, there is no illumination.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Spence

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product and excellent seller!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I have been having trouble to read small letters especially maps, medicine descriptions and any documents. I worked as a graphic designer for 40years and now realized that designers do not care about the universally readable letters size but they do care about only their designing matters. Anyway, this product is incredible helpful and useful for any occasions and locations. LED light is quite new for us. It is great idea! And also we received very nice comment from the seller. We strongly recommend this product for anybody. Y.
customer_reviews.author: Y. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: just love this
customer_reviews.text: I just love this magnifier. Sounds silly but as you get older , I swear the world makes print on everything tiny! I wear glasses but still could not see the tiny print. This magnifier is great. A light and different strength so I can see even the tiniest prints. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Marion T. Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: with MagniPros Glasses like this one
customer_reviews.text: Well, with MagniPros Glasses like this one, there is nothing that you can not read or see. Keep producing and availing to needy consumers like myself...it makes a huge difference in the quality of our lives and vision.
customer_reviews.author: Regina M Erdmann

customer_reviews.title: Stupid Design and Batteries Not Included
customer_reviews.text: The 4.5X area on the lens is annoying when you're trying to read a full page. This thing is great for reading the small print on a bottle of pills, but not what you want for reading a book or magazine for any period of time.
customer_reviews.author: kontrst

customer_reviews.title: Great Tool for Failing Eyesight
customer_reviews.text: We have used this product to read the extra small print on lists of ingredients and similar. Great magnification with a well lit field of vision because of the well placed LEDs. Great product . Great price. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Reader

customer_reviews.title: A long name for a useful item!
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with all features of the MagniPros 3 Ultra Bright LED Lights 3X 4.5X 25X Power Handheld Reading Magnifying Glass with Light- Ideal for Reading Small Prints, Map, Coins, Inspec. Three glass is clear and magnifies well and the LED lights are powerful and do their job. I used it the day I received it and mostly every day since. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Paul Saronson

customer_reviews.title: did not work
customer_reviews.text: I could not get it to work, I followed the limited directions but nothing happened A friend tried ans was unsuccessfu as well
customer_reviews.author: Merepoint

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable to hold and wotks great
customer_reviews.text: I got this specifically to look at the fine print of the ingredients on my dogs and cats canned food. Some are about impossible to read with the bare eye but with this great magnifier I now can see if the ingredients are what I know they should be for my pets.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Schirm

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: 3 different strength lenses work well to allow inspection of small parts etc. Reading might be more convenient in a rectangular format, but works just fine for my use. LED's are nice but as my eyes age the adage "more light is better" holds true. Very good product!
customer_reviews.author: Butch

customer_reviews.title: It was a good price and overall as advertized so I'm satisfied but ...
customer_reviews.text: It was a good price and overall as advertized so I'm satisfied but the lense could have been more clear. It came with a few scratches on it. I can see over time if its in a drawer with other items it will get pretty scratched up. I'm happy with the value.
customer_reviews.author: Mike A

customer_reviews.title: Great For Tired Old Eyes
customer_reviews.text: This magnifying glass has lots of uses from reading small print to looking at any defects in coins. I like using all three magnifiers. I bought this for my hubby. He is having such trouble he is going blind in one eye so I bought him another. I already had this magnifier on order so I kept it for myself. My hubby does use this one, the led lights are a great help. You can read with just those lights on. This product is a must for tired dimming vision I love it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: D. Cederquist

customer_reviews.title: Oh look who is getting old
customer_reviews.text: I don't wear glasses. Nixon was President when I was born. That's how long it takes to need one of these handy magnifying glasses. OR there is a tiny font conspiracy. I suspect it's a mixture of both.
customer_reviews.author: honesty

customer_reviews.title: Best Value
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that this device is more capable than others in that it has three different magnifications along with LED lighting and a substantial protective frame around the lens. I bought a second for my wife because of this. It's also surprisingly inexpensive, which was a pleasant surprise.
customer_reviews.author: gmark99

customer_reviews.title: Good design but the spring for the battery is crocked.
customer_reviews.text: Please go for it If you can find similar product elsewhere. The vendor told to replace it but never keep the promise.
customer_reviews.author: James chen

customer_reviews.title: A great invention!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought one for my husband to use for working on micro projects. He loved it so much . When I saw my mother in-law struggle with a small magnifying glass to read the newspaper, I knew I had to get her one too. She loves using it every day and really likes that it lights up. She said it makes it easier to read that way.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Montigny

customer_reviews.title: Good Practical Magnifier
customer_reviews.text: This is a good practical magnifier. The LED feature is a positive. It has come in handy on several cases and I've only had it for a few weeks. I expect to get good use from this device.
customer_reviews.author: John M

customer_reviews.title: Get one
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why I waited so long to buy a magnifying glass. It's such a useful item. This one came with a covering on both sides of the viewer so there were no scratches or damage to the lens at all. Having the light makes it even better. The only reason I didn't give it five stars is because the 4.5x and 25x viewers are so tiny it's a bit challenging to use them. But once you are able to focus on your item with them, the view is clear. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: L.B.

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Love this I use it because I like to examine my Swarovski crystals to make sure the are authentic. Sometime the markings are extremely small and I can not see them with only my glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Curran

customer_reviews.title: The 2 smaller magnifiers are useless.
customer_reviews.text: If you were buying it only for the large magnifier, it’s fine. It’s lightweight. The smaller magnifiers are useless.
customer_reviews.author: April Fitch

customer_reviews.title: Can't do without it
customer_reviews.text: Well had a bulb go out in an old Christmas ornament and I was struggling to read the markings to replace until I got out the magnifying glass. Boom! With the light and 25x magnification I could read the markings. This is a great product to have just in case.
customer_reviews.author: L.M.

customer_reviews.title: Nice magnifying lens
customer_reviews.text: Light weight, easy to use. Light takes 3 AAA batteries and is very bright. Large lens works well. The 2 small lenses are more difficult for me to use. Fortunately the large lens has been sufficient thus far.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best magnifying glass ever.
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best magnifying glass for the money. The light on the handle is easy to activate and is extremely bright. It is a great value for the money. I would definitely recommend to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Greenwood Red

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This is a good quality magnifier. I don’t find the 25x very useful, just too much magnification for the small glass. The others work very well and I don’t see any imperfections. I also like that the manufacturer reaches out before I even received the magnifying glass to be sure I was completely satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry R. Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Elderly Readers
customer_reviews.text: After buying three different models of lighted magnifying glass during the past several months, I like this one the best with its right-thumbed on/off button and its 3X and 4.5X lenses for reading buttonand its 3X and 4.5X lenses. It is perfect for elderly people to read newspaper articless and other small-printed texts.
customer_reviews.author: DONALD E. SEAMAN

customer_reviews.title: much easier now to read small print
customer_reviews.text: i am very happy with this lighted magnifying glass. actually, i am really thankful for it. reading small print and labels is now possible. i am so glad and grateful that i purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I can see clearly now
customer_reviews.text: Just as expected and getting the 25X is a treat. The only thing not mentioned is the need to loosen the screw on the back to open the compartment to insert the batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Esee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for reading
customer_reviews.text: My husband’s eyesight is deteriorating and he has struggled to read as a result. This is an easy to use magnifying glass and it has a light on it for less than ideal lighting. He loves it!
customer_reviews.author: JoJo

customer_reviews.title: Read that small print
customer_reviews.text: The directions on just about everything these days is printed so small I can't read it with my glasses on in bright sunlight. So frustrating! This lightweight, lighted magnifying glass makes it effortless. Large and comfortable to hold, it was a great purchase and reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: MAGNIFYING GLASS
customer_reviews.text: I WOULD HAVE PREFERRED A HIGHER MAGNIFICATION. SOME FONTS APPEAR TO BE WRITTEN FOR ANTS THEY ARE SO TINY AND EVEN WITH THE MAGNIFIER, I HAVE TROUBLE READING.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen

customer_reviews.title: The powerful part of the magnifier is much too small to use.
customer_reviews.text: It's fairly clumsy. The large part of the magnifier does very little. the more powerful parts magnify quite a bit but at such a small area it's not worthwhile.
customer_reviews.author: Roscoe

customer_reviews.title: Excellent glass
customer_reviews.text: This is the best magnifying glass I have found. It is just the right size for my old hands and the light helps me with the small print. Vic Jowders
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best magnifying glass we have found for the price so we bought a second one.
customer_reviews.text: The combination of an excellent magnifying glass and push button activated lights make this magnifying glass really effective and easy to use in all lighting conditions. The two spot magnifiers with higher magnification are also helpful at times. Being older we use the magnifying glass all the time and we highly recommend it. We bought the second one to use in our vacation place so we're obviously sold on the product!
customer_reviews.author: DLA

customer_reviews.title: JUST what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Doing genealogy research and wanted to sit down some senior relatives. I bought two and they went to great use. They will in the future as well. Admittedly I don’t understand two of the magnifications but the largest portion of glass operates as one would generally expect and the LED lights are a welcomed bonus.
customer_reviews.author: DerekDC

customer_reviews.title: Great little glass!
customer_reviews.text: I use it for reading---increasingly as my vision deteriorates. The LED lights are a wonderful idea and make the glass even more useful.
customer_reviews.author: bibliophile

customer_reviews.title: No headline
customer_reviews.text: Having trouble opening it to put batteries in so haven't done so and so use has been little at this time. I will eventually figure it out
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: Good magnification, light weight, and 3 built in led's to brighten up what you're looking at, in my case, coins. Excellent value!
customer_reviews.author: Dave D.

customer_reviews.title: Great aid in reading
customer_reviews.text: I'm retired, love to read. This magnifier is great help, much easier to read, large lens is great.
customer_reviews.author: Henry

customer_reviews.title: LED lights
customer_reviews.text: Find the LED lights very helpful. Also magnifications are excellent. Would recommend this product. Only thing (?) negative...cover of battery compartment keeps popping off.
customer_reviews.author: Happy

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: It came quicker than it said it would. I really love it. I am an old woman and can’t read small print. This is a life saver.
customer_reviews.author: SusieQ

customer_reviews.title: Hard to get the battery compartment to open, had to use aparing knife.
customer_reviews.text: I love tihs product, so usable once you get the batteries in and even before, no smearing of words, everything crisp and clear.
customer_reviews.author: marlene

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Design - Does it's Job
customer_reviews.text: The batteries were hard to put in at first, but once I got them in, the magnifier works like a charm. Shipping was great. Came overnight. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Harry H. Husted

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: We purchased the magnifying glass for my 83 year old mother in law...she uses it everyday to read ...it’s very lightweight and the light is so bright! It was perfect for her! Wonderful product. Extremely fast shipping!
customer_reviews.author: Vickie Elaine Severt Bazen

customer_reviews.title: Quality magnifying glass
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality magnifying glass. I've only had it a short time, but already it's been very useful. The light helps a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy Frances

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: Not good product. Very heavy, hard to handle, and every time you turn around the batteries are falling out. No I would not buy again. Or recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: LW

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made but the price reflects the value. It works well, nice size and is handy on your desk or table nearby. Nice to have the light feature although it probably won't last too long w/o the switch failing.Handle carefully and it should continue to be the handy magnifier you want it to be.
customer_reviews.author: Ron L.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: This instrument is not satisfactory for any task requiring magnification.
customer_reviews.author: mmmetal

customer_reviews.title: Magnifying capacity is good
customer_reviews.text: This is good magnifying glass the only negative I would say there is a distortion in picture . Looks durable and not that expensive.
customer_reviews.author: K Raj

customer_reviews.title: Good magnifier
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for reading when the writing is tiny. I used it successfully to read the inscriptions inside some rings I inherited
customer_reviews.author: Steven Karp

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs - recommended.
customer_reviews.text: Looked at quite a few before deciding on this and I am very pleased. The magnification in the primary viewing area is perfect for most tasks and the auxiliary magnification lenses work well when I encounter very tiny text (or in my case faded and damaged embossing on precision machine tools). The light is handy - I use the light it about half the time. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Vincent

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value for price
customer_reviews.text: Nice size, bright light, just what I was looking for when trying to make out those tiny darned 1/8W resistor color codes!
customer_reviews.author: Gus Altobello Jr

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband and he loves it. It magnifies clearly and has a light too. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Travel Buff

customer_reviews.title: Nice clear lenses.
customer_reviews.text: Lenses are nice and clear without any blemishes. Wish the largest lens was more powerful. LEDs are nice for the 3X and 4.5X lenses but don't really work well when viewing through the 25x lens in the handle.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent

customer_reviews.title: It Works As Expected
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice item. I like the LED lights together with the magnifying glass. It's very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Idea!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great idea and helps tremendously. As you get older you can see close up like you use to and this really changes that. Great removing splinters, thorns, glass, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Torri

customer_reviews.title: Great magnifying glass!!!
customer_reviews.text: Just a great magnifying glass and like the lighted festure. Perfect size for reading small print after my Cataract surgery. Light weight, fits your hand well ... five stars for sure!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jan M.Werb

customer_reviews.title: Worth a try
customer_reviews.text: A little difficult to find the right section of the glass to use but all in all not bad
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I like this magnifier. It is clear, lightweight and the right size. I have not used the light yet.
customer_reviews.author: HRH

customer_reviews.title: product performs as advertised
customer_reviews.text: requires 3 AAA batteries but the battery compartment does not allow for the 3 AAA batteries to be inserted correctly therefore the light does not work - but effort to return is not worth it...Wish I could take it to Kohl s department store to return - but instead I'll keep it and use it without the light feature :(
customer_reviews.author: Gaylene A. Narcisse

customer_reviews.title: Not such a bright idea after all.
customer_reviews.text: Can't imagine what I was thinking. In future, I'll get my magnifying glasses locally.
customer_reviews.author: Bernard E Cowan

customer_reviews.title: It magnifies!
customer_reviews.text: It's a magnifying glass that magnifies. The light works. What else is there to say?
customer_reviews.author: Posh

customer_reviews.title: Just the tool I needed
customer_reviews.text: Reading Microprint Directions and med labels - well made - led lighting - works for me
customer_reviews.author: gfleet

customer_reviews.title: I am very pleased with the MagniPros 3 Bright LED Lights
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with the MagniPros 3 Bright LED Lights. It is very easy to use and works great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: MagniPros 3 Ultra Bright LED Lights 3X 4.5X 25X Power Handheld Reading Magnifying Glass with Light- Ideal for Reading Small Prints, Map, Coins, Inspection and Jewelry Loupe
feature_bullets: ★PROFESSIONAL OPTICAL GRADE MAGNIFYING LENS:For crystal clear image and distortion free viewing. It provides greater clarity and durability than lesser materials.The super bright LED lights fully illuminate the viewing area for easy visual recognition.
★STYLISH & ERGONIMIC HANDLE: The Lightweight Comfortable ergonomic design handle is perfect for longer reading time without tiring hands
★3 ULTRA BRIGHT LED LIGHTS: The 3 built-in energy-efficient led lights are designed to last 25,000+ hours provide evenly lit viewing area, powered by 3 AAA batteries(NOT INCLUDED),

★3 DIFFERENT MAGNIFICATIONS- Different magnification for different purposes, the 3.5" magnifying lens magnifies up to 3X, the spot lens magnifies up to 4.5X, the smallest lens magnifies up to 25X which can be used as jewelry loupe
★LIGHTWEIGHT & STURDY: Constructed out of unbreakable ABS making it lightweight and sturdy than most of other reading magnifiers, it is ideal for long reading time without fatique hands.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars791 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
